content: crochet this cute pig keychain with the diy fluffies youtube video this video is available for free in english and dutch when you make it with cotton sport weight yarn the size will be 5 cm/ 2 inch you can make it bigger by using thicker yarn and a larger crochet hook english video https //youtu be/3mkyv13x6y8 dutch nederlands video https //youtu be/xzmoby79ozs
